overview: Kamal, who used to wash cars for a living, decides to turn his life around upon the advice of Ika, the girl he is in love with. In order to do that, he takes a risk and makes an illegal loan to open a burger stall without Ika's knowledge
tagline: Kalau awak tanya dalam dunia ini apa yang saya hendak, Saya akan cakap saya hendak awak! [If you're wondering what I want in the world, I would say I want you!]
title: Cerita Kita
